event.title: Django based CMS - Wagtail kick off meeting
event.description:
Launch meeting on the 16th March for the Python Django CMS - Wagtail. 

See the new Wagtail-specific meetup at 

http://www.meetup.com/Bristol-Wagtail-Users-and-Developers/

We will have four speakers give lightning talks - two of which from Torchbox folks about Wagtail.

We'll take a quick QA session to find out what people want from a Wagtail meet up.

We'll also plan the next Python Django meetup ... which is likely to be at Oracle's offices in Bristol in May sometime.

Then we can head off to the pub!

(Please sign up on the Wagtail site too - Gary)
